text: These were so tasty!I tried all of the sugar free mixes and recommend them all.

This was okay but maybe too sweet and syrupy for me...I had to dilute it with club soda and even some lime sour margarita mix.It was too much like Kool Aid and very sweet.But I love that it does not have calories so that still gives it 4 stars!

I would recommend changing the mixture on the bottle to 1 shot of tequila to 2 shot of mix and add 1 shot of club soda.I enjoyed the mix,but thought is was too tart.The club soda made a significant improvement.
The margarita mix is so good!32 oz is not enough!Ordering a bigger size next time!
My favorite coconut water....immediate relief for cramps and restless leg syndrome!!
Not bad but tastes a little like cough syrup
like regular test!
Very satisfied and like the passion fruit flavor
Thus far the best shake of all the varieties I have tried.It definitely helps replace one meal.I would recommend it to anyone.
This product is one of the best energy shake protien powders on the market.Chuck full of Vits and mins.Also has a good taste.

Because of the expense,this was requested as a Christmas present.This is something that the recipient swears will ward off physical maladies of various types.I think it tastes pretty awful but he thinks the taste is wonderful,so it is a matter of opinion on that.It is definitely chock full of healthy ingredients.He has been using this stuff for decades and swears by it.So glad they continue to make it.
this shake really gets me going in the morning.you should try it if you feel just beat in the mornings,this should help.

Do not know about the energy boost but do know that I love this shake!Alot of protein shakes leave you with upset tummy feeling,but not this one!Tastes great even mixed with just water.LOVE it Thanks!

I was so surprised how good this tasted when I first tried it I like mixing it with orange juice.I am an elementary teacher,and I noticed that when I started to get sick and drank a bunch of this,it helped ward off my cold.It has over 1000% Vitamin C.It is quite filling and makes you feel so good!Well worth the money.
I have been using it as a smoothie base everyday since it arrived.I am now ordering more.It is WONDERFUL!

I was first introduced to Monin syrups from my sister who owned two coffee shops that served only the best quality coffee and espresso.I love this brand.I love that the ingredients are natural pure cane sugar.It is the only brand I use in my espresso drinks.If you want quality,this is for you.I highly recommend it!
This product was good
Great flavor.Not overpowering
Very sweet with only a slight hint of hazelnut.I prefer a stronger hazelnut flavor.
Yes,summer coming.Rather than drinking tea as sweet as breakfast cereal,consider this Take glass,fill with ice,pour in limeade.Add shot of cherry syrup,then stir,shake or swizzle until content.
I am planning to use this syrup in cake recipes.I think it will work well.Great packaging!
Good product,really adds to ice tea flavor
I bought this to use as a flavoring to help me enjoy drinking more water.The cherry flavor is very good.
Good value and tastes great.I mix it in my bottled water.The glass bottle keeps it fresh and protected.
i bought this because i had gout.I would just take 1 2 table of this stuff to relieve mo of the pain.and it does work!sometimes i just jug it down without the spoon!Plus it is very delicious!

This worked great on my toe gout and was pretty tasty too.I since have gone to microwaving frozen cherries and eating them,but if you like the extra convenience of concentrate this is an effective source.My fingers get warm so it might help BP and circulation too...not sure.
Tastes great.I brought them for my gout,but now everyone in the family is mixing it up into punches and drinks for the flavor.
Very high quality juice and last a long time.Works great for gout,stops the pain immediately.I highly recommend it.

I am an herbalist,and I purchased this for my husband who has issues with gout.This brand is the best tasting black cherry juice concentrate on the market.I have him mix it with a little bit of cold water before bed.This is also great mixed with a little water added to your taste preferences and then frozen into popsicles.Add a daily dose of potassium citrate to your daily regimen,and presto!No more gout!

I have had gout problems for a few years.I take six TSP in soda water every day.It tastes great and no need for medicine for a couple years now.This brand has a nice taste without adding sweeteners.I have tried a few and it really tastes great.
Good,balanced flavor.Pretty convenient and can mix to strength or combine with other juices.Was thinking about incorporating into a mead,but this is a sweet cherry flavor,not tart at all.
I like that it is not sweetened,and it has a great flavor when mixed with water or anything else.
Black Cherry Concentrate is the best solution for energy,vitamins arthritis.We have taken this product for over 20 years and love it totally.
really does not taste very good,i know there are a lot of health benefits but I ended up throwing it a way and going back to isomer and veggie elite
Flavor is good,but texture is very different.
Does not taste too bad.I Am not really a protein shake person I think but this product was good for me.I do wish it kept me a little fuller
This tastes terrible.Very chalky and gritty,and had an odd chemical taste.Really bad aftertaste too.I made one shake,could not finish it,and threw the rest of the powder away.
This is a very good tasting protein powder that dissolves well in milk or water.
It tastes great
Awful tasting stuff
Just what I was looking for,I add yogurt,almond milk,and can pumpkin!!
I Have tried a lot of them and this one is my favorite.It seems to go with all the different fruits.
I mix half a scoop with another half scoop of Simply Natural Spirutein and the specified amount of milk to arrive at my preferred flavor.This brand is the best nutritional shake product I have tried.
Product is what I expected it to be.The taste to me is that not bad compared to the smell.I gag every time I open the container.Time will tell if I get over the smell!

Wow.I was so moved by this product that I had to go online and write a review.It is THAT BAD.Not only does it form into little clumps in my glass even though it claims on the package that it dissolves instantly,but it has hands down the most disgusting taste I have ever experienced.I am pretty realistic about protein drinks I do not expect them to be delicious.However,this one by far is the worst...
has a great taste
Very poor packaging.Bottle arrived broken.

I really love the smoothness of the Mexican coke.In my opinion it taste a lot better and it refreshes me more than the regular coke we have in the YOU.S.I really recommend that people try this product because its very good and its one of my favorites.There Is a restaurant that sells them and i constantly go over to that restaurant and just order a few for me and my family.

The Coca Cola company contributed $1,700,500 to defeat the California Prop 37 also known as The California Right to Know Genetically Engineered Food Act. .Do you really want to buy from a company that does not want you to know that GMO is in your food?

I was just in Houston Texas and found these bottle for $1.29 each.The prices on Amazon are way to high.I was there the first week of May,2010 They want double the price here.Talk about making a killing!!!!!!!!!
This stuff is great when compared to the American version.However,do not order it online.Just get in the car and go to Sam if you have one nearby.It our Sam,it is like $17.00 for a case of bottles.
Just so you know,you can usually get this at your local bodega or Mexican grocery store for less than half the price.I am like 1500 miles from Mexico and I can still find it locally.

I have been a big fan of EFS products in the past.The lemon lime flavor tasted great and mixed well with the Carbo Pro that I also use during some longer distance triathlons.I am able to keep from cramping and stay well hydrated.

My wife and I love this stuff.Great flavor,not too sweet,just a little salt,but exactly what you need during a long run or ride.This does not hurt our stomachs like some drinks do,which is among the most important things that you can ask from a sports drink.I am a cramper,so fuelling with electrolyte rich drinks is important.This definitely does the trick and gets me through training and races without issue.
Best endurance drink out there.
The best!!Keeps me pushing hard 3 hours into my rides!!
Perfect size,perfect taste!
Water Tastes good,and all the water bottles and package were closed.
Bottles came with snashed tops
I drink this water every day.It is the perfect size for me.Also,we are prone to hurricanes in FL and it comes in handy if there should be one.
The ad for this product showed cartoon pictures on the bottles that is why I bought them to hand out for Halloween.I was disappointed because they were regular bottles no cartoon pictures.

I chose to rate it as three star because while the cups are awesome in size,the straws are horrible quality.I received the package and everything was nice and sealed but the issue i found is that ALOT of the tapioca pearls were either crushed or there just was not a satisfactory amount of them in there.I would say keep shopping around.

Cups lids and shaker were not as pictured.You get 5 very cheap plastic cups with flat lids and the shaker was just a regular plastic bottle.The rest of it seems to be ok but it definitely is not enough for 30 drinks.
Great tea pearls.Easy to prepare.
Ready in few minutes,love the the taste
These taste good any very much like other boba that I have eaten in the paste.

I am a big fan of dark chocolate,and have tried several kinds of dark hot chocolate.This is my favorite one.It is even better than Godiva.There is an interesting review on here about how Ghirardelli changed and worsened the recipe.That is unfortunate,but I still think it is the best.
I sent this hot chocolate mix to a friend.She called to thank me and to say it was the best hot chocolate she ever had. It was delicious and I am trying not to keep drinking it all at once!
I thought the hot choc.mix was not very sweet and did not like it.So unless you like you choc.a bit unsweet then do not get it.
This product of course was very tasty,the only part I did not enjoy was paying more for the shipping than what I paid for the chocolate mix.

Thi is some grade A KONA coffee.I have ordered quite a lot of it.I have only got my Kona from Hawaii.The extra price is worth every darn penny.I know when I order from these folks That it will not get much better.do I need to say anymore.
Superb quality coffee beans.The aroma is amazing and the taste is devine.My only issue is the quantity of the bag.One bag does not last long.

I have been buying fresh beans for a few years now and can tell when beans are getting stale and these were not roasted in the time frame as advertised,it even had the date printed on the bottom when it was roasted and it was several weeks old.I would not recommed this product.
It is OK,but I still prefer Kona from Trader Joe both for the quality and for the price.If I am out of Trader Joe Kona,this would be my next choice.
Abit expensive,but you also get what you pay for.Kona Coffee is the best.I will be re ordering this item very soon.Thanks Amazon!
this coffee is good but not good enough for the price unless you like it better than i did.but if you are coffee nut with the money the coffee is good.

I am not a coffee lover.However,I like to learn how to distinguish different coffee by types and quality.Based on all reviews on this product,this is a top quality coffee.However,it tastes very bitter to me,comparing to other lower coffee beans I have tried over the years.Can someone tell me that the better quality coffee the bitter taste?My next is to try the Blue Mountain to see the difference.
Great coffee.Mild taste.No bitterness.Expensive but worth it.
Just as advertised,great seller!
I bought this for my Dad on Fathers day last year since Kona is his favorite.A little pricey,but the coffee was really good.Definitely worth the money for a special occasion.
I love Kona coffee but I found this one to be very disappointing.Bitter yet tasteless,with almost no aroma.Loved the cute little burlap bag though.

This is my first time trying 100% Koma coffee.The coffee beans look lightly roasted,and the coffee gives a very naturally pleasant aroma.Definitely great coffee beans,which is worth giving them a try!!

great deep flavorful coffee i made espresso with this and found it to be very enjoyable for a medium roast kona thinking it might have been brewed to be light and runny.But it was really good and full bodied without the burnt taste of dark roasted starbucks beans.
the best coffees.My husband loves Kona Coffee and not the Kona Blend.I wish it was not so expensive.Thanks
Love this coffee!Reminds us of our visit to Kauai!!Bold and rich,it is a treat every morning!Love the packaging
Very good coffee.Bought some for Christmas gifts last year and it was well received by my serious coffee friends.So,I am back to get some more Kona stocking stuffers.

This coffee is sold as extra bold but while it has a very rich and cultivated taste it is less strong than the bold Verona,which I regarded to be too bold for me.I love coffee and this one has easily become my favorite.My wife loves this coffee in the morning even more than I do.She discovered it.Generally,she does not like bold coffee but she does not think of this one as too bold or too strong.

The label says it is bold.I do not really know what bold means,but I do know that there is a distinct coffee taste to this Sumatra.I grind my beans every day.The taste is good,not strong,just the right way coffee should taste.

i love this coffee.i drink it black.i drink it 7 days a week,a few cups a day in the morning.it is bold and strong and i would not want it any other way.it is delicious.it may not be for everyone,but i give it 5 stars.
I sent this coffee to two friends back east.they thoroughly enjoyed getting it and said it was delicious.

This is my favorite starbucks roast,but why do not you just go to your local starbucks to purchase this,its the same price if you just go there and you do not have to pay for shipping and handeling and all that stuff,plus they will grind it for you there.
If you like a strong but smooth flavorful coffee this is it.I have tried others and just keep coming back to this one.My second joice would be the Starbucks Italian blend.
This product arrived quick,and I plan on giving this as a Cristmas gift.It was the exact type ground,medium that I ordered and a great price as well.
i sent this coffee to friends back east.they enjoyed receiving it and said it was delicious.

What can I say for a coffee that is the ultimate rich,smooth,elegant...these words do not do this coffee justice.I have had hundreds of brands of coffee and this by far is the finest.You will find yourself on vacation everyday when you enjoy this brew.Sit back and enjoy life...YOU deserve it!!!
love this coffee.Got it at a great price
Always have liked Starbucks.Even better to have with breakfast,at home.
In this order,The coffee beans were not vacuum packed which is the usual condition that I receive them in prior orders.

smoothest coffee I have ever had!its like melt in your mouth butter.Fantastic quality,pricey but was a nice gift.If you are more into blends you can get good kona blend or you can splurge and buy this!
Each of these pods brews 8 ounces,as opposed to the Senseo brand which only brews 4.So it is much less expensive overall than the senseo brand.
Great quality coffee.This is some of the best coffee made.It is smooth and has great flavor.
Con tuta amore!Italy best!
Perfect for all machines
Great tasting espresso.Always buy this brand.Use it in Bialetti MOKA stove top pot.
awsome taset
If you like delicious,not bitter coffee you will love ily!
best coffee ever
Its coffee.
I ordered decaf coffee and received decaf espresso twice!I feel bad about their costs so I gave up on this one.

I went to a famous fancy restaurant for a treat 40 years ago and was introduced to this delicious coffee and have never looked back,nor do I stock anything else in my home.I always get compliments from company about the coffee and even the caffeine dinners do not know the difference!Try it,and you will never go back to your old coffee again.
While we definitely love Lilly,we still feel it is overpriced and therefore we will not purchase again.there are other good quality Espresso coffees that far less.
If you like coffee but watch your caffiene intake pick some of this up.Tastes great,could be priced more aggresively.The taste is full and rich with no bitterness.
Really great decaf coffee.Tried many different brands and this one is alway fresh and just the right flavor.I highly recommend this product.

I purchased this decaf by mistake at the supermarket and loved it.Only after going through half the can did I notice it was decaf!Tastes just like regular ILY but is also decaf...soo if you want good decaf I recommend this.
Best fresh coffee ever.These cans are very convienent.Sealed and coffee always fresh.Love ily coffee
Always a great product.Coffee is a very personal thing.We all like what we like and not what the other person likes!So for me,this is a wonderful cappuccino.
Small size and decaf not great.
Great coffee,but way overpriced.Other brands are cheaper and taste as well.
Careful!!These do not come with the lids on them!And no returning!!!
Maybe the best tasting canned coffee you can mail order!In fact it is better than Char bucks,coffee bean,and all the other national chains by a long shot.
Love this coffee!
The best brand of coffee ever.Worth every penny!!!

I bought this Kona coffee hoping to find a good Keurig.I am finding all the Keurig flavors lacking.For me Keurigs just do not have that rich coffee brewed taste and smell.And sadly this Kona cup was another fail.
Yes,it is more on the steeper side that what we are used to,getting coffee shipped from foreign lands.This is grown and packaged in Hawaii though and has great flavor.

The coffee tastes amazing,but the shipping and handling kills...my cost out the door,including S and H was $15,which is really steep for 12oz.I love the coffee,but I am unlikely to reorder because of the S and H.
best coffee look forward to it every morn.
We love this coffee.Our favorite so far.Used to drink another but they quit making it!Will drink this from now on!

This coffee tastes like is smells and it smells like grandma apple pie.It is wonderful and the whole beans keep the flavor for quite some time I had it in a ziploc bag for about 6 months .Actually,all The Red Buffalo coffee are as good as they smell.You cannot go wrong with ordering any flavor of their coffee.I am a flavored coffee aficionado and this is one of the few brands that are great all around.
The vanilla flavor is really good and the coffee tastes just as it smells.
amazing coffee

Probably the best present I have bought my girlfriend since I have known her.She was cautious at drinking a new coffee even though she loves flavored coffee.She brought the coffee to make at her job.Everyone at her job was asking here where she got it.She received compliments left and right over it.If you loved coffee and want to try something new go ahead.I thought it was a tad bit over priced but it is not like I will buy it everyday.
Disappointing.
Chocolate orange is a great coffee flavor,but this company does not do it well.The coffee itself is not roasted well and the chocolate orange flavoring is not pronounced enough.,
The coffee is good but I cannot taste the orange or chocolate in it at all.
Chocolate orange coffee is one of my favorite,so I am glad this company carries it.Will be giving it for an Xmas gift to my husband.

Best flavored coffee ever!The chocolate and orange do not overpower yet add the best taste sensation.The aroma kick starts your day and is good for multiple cups.I have tried many brands and nany combos with chocolate in them.This is now at the top of my list.

After trying numerous companies that produce orange flavored coffee I have found Red Buffalo produces the most delicious blend,will grind it to your specifications,and have that small Mom and Pop pride in their products.Thanks,Red Buffalo!!!Delicious!
This medium bold coffee offers a mild chocolate flavor with just a hint of orange at the finish.It is an enjoyable and delicately flavored coffee.

The coffee I ordered was here in less than a week after I placed the order.The packaging was excellent.The coffee was fresh and tastes very good.I will buy from this company again in the future.Thanks Don.

I did not know how lucky I was when my regularly purchased decaf chocolate flavored coffee was discontinued.If the corporate big wigs at Milstone were not as cavalier with their customers I never would have discovered the best coffee ever Red Buffalo Chocolate Almond Decaf !Not only that the people are great,too!

I was looking forward to this coffee because I love chocolate and orange.Received it yesterday and tried it today really disappointed!Absolutely no hint of chocolate or orange,not even good coffee flavor and a bitter aftertaste.I am SO sorry I bought it and will recommend to my friends and family to stay away from this brand.

This is by far the best coffee I have ever had.If you do not want to be addicted to a particular brand flavor,then do not try this.Otherwise,you will be hooked.I have also tried their cinnamon blend,which I did not care for as much seemed to be too strong of a cinnamon flavor,and I love cinnamon .Check out prices at their website first though,as they may be cheaper there.
I have ordered this three winters in a row and we love it.Our house would not smell like christmas with out it.There other flavors are great also.Thanks!!
I have ordered this brand and flavor of coffee many times,it is good.

I ordered Red Buffalo Cherry Chocolate Coffee in the hopes that it would taste like the Cherry Chocolate Coffee that Einstein used to sell in January and February.Alas,within a few days of ordering this coffee I was notified that it was no longer available.
Rating this coffee because I want people to know this is some good tasting coffee,I looked for chocolate and I found this one.Decided to try and I am glad I did.Excellent with dessert.

My favorite coffees from Gevalia are Traditional Roast,Columbian,Signature Blend,and this one Antigua.Antigua has a similar flavor to Columbian,smooth and rich without being too strong or harsh.Highly recommended as a flavor to try from Gevalia,especially if you like their Traditional Roast and Columbian.
This coffee is great,This is the only brand I buy for flavored coffee.
Cannot taste the flavors.The coffee is OK if you like black coffee.I wanted the distinct taste and aroma of chocolate and cherry.This coffee does not have it.
Best coffee I ever made.

I love coffee from Red Buffalo.The flavors are fabulous!!For health reasons,I only drink decaf and this company,thankfully,offers lucsious flavors in decaf,which other coffee vendors do not.Red Buffalo will be my ONLY SOURCE for coffee I love.In addition to their wonderful product,their customer service is top flight.connie,lakesdie,arizona
It was simply my preference.I was looking for an uncomplicated blueberry flavor and not necessarily other complimentary flavors.That being said it was a good flavor and very fragrant.
MY FAVORITE COFFEE!!!It is really delicious!HIGHLY RECCOMEND!

This coffee tastes good,do not get me wrong.But it is a bit on the expensive side and when I think tiramisu,this is not the flavor that comes to mind.It tastes a lot like a vanilla flavored coffee to me that has that sort of fake taste to it.I guess I am not sure what I was expecting I guess more of that really rich chocolate espresso flavor but this was kind of disappointing to me.

This coffee is amazing!!!If you are thinking about trying it,I highly suggest you do!I came back to try other flavors of this coffee it was so good.Served it to my friends and they just raved about it!!!!BRAVO RED BUFFALO!!!!

Got this for my parents for the month of december along with a couple other red buffalo coffees.They seem to really like it and my mom says that it has a rich flavor,but at the same time does not taste like a synthetic flavor.They love it
gave as a gift and she liked it
Very nice blueberry flavor!The Creme Brulee is absolutely amazing!!!This blueberry cobbler is a great after dinner coffee,feels like dessert!

I love the orange taste in this coffee.The ladies in my household like the chocolate flavor.A great combination for the whole family.The same company makes a variety of Bananas Foster coffee that I do not really care for.But this is a definite winner and will remain a staple in our cabinet.
i was ;ooking for a good cinnamon coffee...this one fell short.i did not care for the f;avor which was not much but the cinnamon flavor was not there.i am sorry
If you enjoy cinnamon this is an excellent coffee.It is smooth but leans toward a bold roast packed with a cinnamon kick.
Has a very good taste...I like it!
Same quality with every cup.
World best Kona coffee hands down.
Great product.Using alone as a coffee substitute.GOOD.
i am adding this to my dandilion root tea using as a diurtic sorta fake coffee so far so good also with some liquid ginger

I was looking for something to replace coffee since I can no longer drink it.I knew before buying this that it would not taste just like coffee but thought it would still have a strong taste to it.I boiled it and used it in an espresso machine and it just was not strong enough for me.Maybe I am not brewing it correctly?The flavor is nice it is just not strong enough for my liking.If you do not like strong coffee you may like this.
I am drinking chicory almost 10 years and this product is the best.This is only just my opinion.

I see somebody else griped about this pricing.Is there an error somewhere?I have ordered it from Groceries Express for $4.45 for the 13 ounce jar $3.88 for the chocolate version .And I never thought of G E as particularly cheap.

What happened?I bought 4 jars of Carnation malted milk in July 2008,for $12.32,from Amazon,eligible for free shipping.Now the price has doubled,and is no longer eligible for free shipping.I love malted milk,but these new prices are criminal.

I love this stuff!Really chocolatey and malty,much better than the bottled Whopper chocolate sauce drink mix.For some reason,no retail stores around here seem to carry it they only have the vanilla .What a relief to find it here I no longer have to spend part of my vacations out East in grocery stores,stocking up so I can have it at home.

AS I kid my mom used to buy this stuff by the case!It was awesome!I started buying it for my nephews and nieces and they LOVE it.Everytime they come to my house,they go to the cabinet to get the malt and to the freezer to get the ice cream so we can make malted milk shakes!It is a family tradition that will be around in my family as long as they sell this product!
great tasting tea
Love this decaf tea.Wish Starbucks had it at their drive ups.

I love it.It is absolutely super.We all have that one kind of tea that is always in the house a standby,if you will.This one right here is my standby.The flavor is extraordinary,and as an added bonus,it is decaffeinated!Like the title says,whether or not one likes a tea is entirely one own opinion,and in MY opinion,this is the most excellent tea ever.
Everyone who tries this tea loves it plus it is decaffeinated.It has a wonderful flavor and it provides a relaxing feeling.

My husband I love this tea!So many green teas are bitter,but the hint of Lotus flower in this gives the perfect flavor.Tazo makes great teas anyway,but this is the best flavor we have found in a long time.Individually wrapped bags make it easy to take one to work,too.
I love Tazo Lotus.It is slightly fruity,not too strong,and decaffeinated.A nice,simple,before bed tea for me.However,there can be a slightly bitter aftertaste.
I was so happy to see decaffeinated Tazo green tea with lotus flower available on Amazon.It is a lovely,delicately flavored green tea.The shipping was on time and the packaging perfect.Very pleased!
I am a huge tea fan and order most tea from England,but this tea,Om,is like...the best that ever passed my lips.Hope it becomes more available.It is very hard to find.I cannot understand why.
I love Om in my iced tea.I usually use 2 Om plus 5 black tea bags for a 1 2 gallon pitcher of sun tea.Wish I could find this in a local store,but happy I can get it on line!
I love green tea,and tea lovers will understand that I strongly prefer the loose leaf kind.However,during the day in the office this is the best substitute for the real thing.Enjoy!
great tea,worth the price
Excellent tea.Balanced,robust.Smooth.Does not need anything in it.
Excellent body,lived up to my expectations
This tea is pleasantly strong without being very bitter.The flavor is very nice.I will be ordering it again.
Not too heavy,but with some bite for the morning.Wonderful with cream.Not easily obtainable,so get some if you can.Truly good tea.
This is a cheap version of loose leaf tea.It has nothing to do with a Darjeeling.I gave it 2 stars for quick delivery.
Excellent black tea with lemon already added.Easy source of antioxidents.Individually sealed bags travel anywhere.Try it hot with honey or drop a bag in your bottle of water for a refreshing drink!

I really like this blend.For me it is a great all day blend.I love Earl Gray Supreme or Breakfast Blend in the morning through lunch and early afternoon.But the Queen Cathrine is good any time of day even when I get home from work.
This is a light,but full bodied tea.I find it very refreshing.I have yet to try a Harney and Sons tea that is not wonderful.
I have been a life long tea drinker and find this tea to be excellent.The flavor and body of the tea are superb.This is my favorite cup of tea and I will purchase again from Harney and Sons.
An exquisite black tea with a little extra.If you are fond of black tea but think Earl Grey is a bit twee,give this one a try.The flavor and aroma are brisk but refined.It is become my standard.
This has become one of my favorite tea blends.Rich without being bitter,it is refreshing and enjoyable.
Given as a gift and was appreciated
Great dark tea.I love to combine with jasmine.
I am wondering if this tea is a little outdated.I love Queen Catherine which I get locally usually But,the flavor falls short from this bag.

I love this tea.I first bought a small tin of it from a local Jungle Jim store and loved it so much,I looked for it on Amazon.I was delighted to find this pound size bag.It arrived well packaged and sealed.The tea inside was absolutely fresh.Have been enjoying it ever since.It is a much for traditional black tea lovers.
This is nice enough,but not so much that I would get it again.Nice black tea; but pretty ordinary.

I am a fan of tea,and have tried many types,and many brands.Harney and Sons is the best I have found so far.The Irish Breakfast tea in particular is one of my favorites.When brewed correctly,it is a bold,flavorful tea,and not bitter.If you steep it too long,it will be too tannin rich for the flavor to come through.I would highly recommend to anyone that loves black tea.

I have heard some hype about Harney and Son,so thought I would give them a try I have tried several Irish Breakfast teas from other tea merchants.This tea was worst Irish Breakfast tea I have ever tried.There was no malty tones that is the signature of Irish Breakfast,and it went bitter in the pot after only a few minutes.Of the teas purchased here,Twinings represents the Irish Breakfast much better.
I love this winter white Earl Grey!All the taste of black Earl Grey without the caffeine!
I love this tea!!
Not nearly as good as Teavanna so it is so far from Mariage Freres that it cannot be measured.No real Earl Grey tea because you cannot taste the bergamont,A mistake.
My wife,who is a tea drinker,simply loves this tea.She has me get it for her birthday each fall.Great product and tastes great even though I am a coffee drinker,mostly .
We love this tea!
I received this tea for Christmas.This tea has a great flavor and has quickly become my new favorite.
did not taste at all as good as the same product in the 4 oz tin.

This is a great first time white tea!The least expensive of Harney whites,but still good quality.It has a delicate flavor and a natural sweetness.I love it with honey.Just remember to follow the steeping directions.
It is tasty and a bit warming,but the price is high for what it is
The tea came quickly.The taste is tart,fruity with cinnamon.This will keep you warm with out the caffeine buzz.The tea has fine particles so I use a fine screen mesh to brew.

Harney and Sons Organic Passion Plum is an excellent way to ease out of caffeine addiction.Although it will not keep you awake like caffeine,it prevents the headaches that most people encounter with quiting.Be sure to preheat the cup to maximize the ginseng,steep at least five minutes,and above all,enjoy!
No matter how many black tea blends I try,I always go back to Brigette Blend as my all time favorite.The thick body,especially as iced tea,is so satisfying.And the taste is as smooth as they come.
Had East Frisian tea while I was in Germany and loved it.This is good but not exactly what I was looking for.
My favorite tea.If you want more from me,pay me for my endorsement.
excellent strong tea.The best on a cold morning

Bought the smaller tin first to try out this tea.Obviously,I like it a lot,as I am buying another,this time bigger tin This tea is wonderful with or without milk and sugar.Strong enough,not bitter!Delivery was faster than indicated.
Fast delivery of my new favorite tea.East Frisian is a substantial tea,but not too heavy.Very satisfying; I lean toward Irish Breakfast and straight CTC Assam and East Frisian completes the trio.
Nicely flavored.A bit pricey.
Good cup of tea

I use this in my Keurig machine with the reusable plastic k cups.You have to use a coffee grinder and grind it pretty fine.A little extra effort but ten times better then the actual k cup version or any bag tea.
This is great tea for those of us who use decaf.I really like it and drink it often.
Earl Grey is a standard great tea and Harney and Sons cannot be beat.Love it.

The scenting oils are so strong,I have to blend this item with unflavored tea.Some people might like it that way; I do not.All the same,I am giving it four stars because it is a quality product.Very few broken leaves,very little dust,and the tea base has an excellent flavor.
I purchase for the tin and was disappointed in it is size!
Good aroma and color.Love it!
Without that problematic caffeine.So pleased!
It is the best tasting decaf earl grey I have had.That being said,I still feel like it is not as good as regular Earl Grey...maybe that is just too much to ask for.It is a decent deal though.
Much better than regular tea bags.Fresh and richer flavor.Will order more.
Exactly what I was looking for!Had bought this at a store while traveling and had not been able to replace it locally.Price a bit high but the taste is wonderful.
This was a gift.He reported back that the tea was delicious.
Great tasting product.I make this in a coffee plunger and can get at least 2 steps out of it.Has a great natural flavor with a slight hint of mint.It is great iced.
Another addition to my collectionof Harney loose teas.I think I am getting close to 30 different flavors.These are just wonderful teas.
A favorite tea of mine,the brand is great in general but the aroma and taste of the raspberry is great
I bought this as a gift for my daughter.She loved it,saying it was very smooth and tasty.A fine cup of tea
The best tea!So much flavor.
Deep dark and string just the way I like it.Very good tea!
Purchased the Irish Breakfast,which is imprinted on the bag.But the lower label states Earl Grey .It definitely tastes like Earl Grey.Disappointed.Honestly cannot be bothered shipping it back.
good ron swanson
Super delicious but if you brew it even a minute too long the bitter taste happens quick.
This was my first loose leaf tea and I love it.Better than any teabag or cachet in this flavor,and I have tried them all.
very fresh.This has replaced my Scottish Breakfast tea and this brand suits me best.cannot wait for my first,second and third cuppa everyday
Good quality,good taste.A great bargain for this price!
Product as expected.I think it is a decent value for the price

Got this for my sister who has traveled the world.She loves tea and her favorite was Irish tea,but she has not been able to find any that measured up in the states.I love Harley and Sons so I decided to send her the Irish Breakfast for her birthday.She is totally a fan and says this is the best she has ever had.
Harney and Sons offers the best tea and Irish Breakfast is one of them
2nd to none.Tried and tried other brands and nothing compares.I am loyal to this brand and this flavor.
yes i love this stuff
Good but not their best tea.

Love love love this tea.Chocolate mint chip icecream in tea form.The bag was sealed nicely and the leaves in wonderful condition.I can drink this tea without any sugar and just a little bit of milk.The mint is very strong in this tea,if you wanted a gentle hint of mint,this tea is not for you.Will definitely by again.
This is the best tea ever.The chocolate and mint flavor are discernible but not overwhelming.
supper flavor
Amazing stuff!
Tough to chew and few nuts.
All of the pieces were very small from being broken up and very little actual peanuts in the brittle.
There are not many peanuts in this brittle.Almost none,really.And it is a bit too sticky chewy.Definitely edible.Definitely sweet.Far from the best peanut brittle I have ever had,though.
They may not be nutritious,but they sure are delicious.Watch out for your crowns,though,because they are,indeed,quite chewy!These are great to fill up the candy bowl at work.
These are soft,chewy,buttery pillows of joyfully explosive caramel flavor.All I can say is YUMMY!These are delish.

Werther Original Chewy Caramels Sold by Smile n Save $9.14 I ordered this but got low fat and 1 bag for 9.14 for a 2.5 oz bag,you can buy small bag like that for 1.00 at any dollar store,was NOT HAPPY,they did send my money back but buyers beware,check what you receive
Came in a timely manner and candy was fresh
These are so good but are at times hard to find.I used them for stocking stuffers at Christmas,they were fresh and perfect.Thank you.
my favorite choclate ever
These were fantastic.As a chocolate covered cherry fan,these are at the top of my favorites list.
I thought these had actual brandy in them but they did not.All hand made,big and sweet.
Very good.I only wish it had more of a booze flavor.
Great chocolates!Make a great gift.
I purchased these last year for a yankee swap at xmas.My son got them and he generally loves chocolate BUT very waxy and not so good.

My wife and I LOVE choc covered peanuts.No,not the yellow bag of M and M.We try all different brand when we see them.this one was nothing special over what you can get at your 24 7 drugstore.I will not buy this again.

Chocolate is not waxy but there is a buttery flavor to the chocolate.Fresh in the tin which is definately to be expected.I am still looking for that perfect chocolate covered peanut.Maybe my next foray will find me the one I am looking for.

These are fantastic!So good that the tin makes a great gift item.The tin itself is a nice big size,lots of peanuts in there.The chocolate coating is very thick and delicious.I am definitely going to buy them again...

This is the second time I have ordered these.The first time they came full sized pretzels fresh and delicious.Second time a bag of mini pretzels.I contacted Asher and it turns out Amazon shipped the wrong item!ASHERS PRETZELS ARE 5 STARS
The whole family loved them and I think they lasted the weekend.
gift was happily rec d
Seversl broken

These were about average as far as Expresso Beans are concerned.The Dark Chocolate tastes good.the beans are good.I would recommend them for now,but I plan to try some other types for comparison.I will try to remember to come back and update as I try other ones.

I had these in my wishlist for a long time.I finally pulled the trigger and got them this morning.They arrived within two days.Solid as a rock!One giant melted solid block of chocolate and beans.40 degrees here this morning.Lesson here is to not buy chocolate from Amazon.??I tried breaking the block apart with my meat mallet and got crumbs.Threw both bags out.
I was eager to try these beans,as I love coffee.Instead,I was very disappointed when the beans arrived in a melted condition,as evidenced by the photo.

These almond butter balls are fabulous and tasty.Full of nutty flavor,they contain a variety of extras such as green tea extract and raisins and are not too sweet.I find them to be a delicious and protein rich snack and I highly recommend them.

These are really great tasting snacks and I am really fussy about my treats!They have to taste really good and these certainly do!At our local health food store they are 95 cents each.At Amazon they work out to about 61 cents each if you can add in something else for 50 cents to qualify for free shipping!
does not taste good
These are terrible and do not contain chocolate.Avoid.
They are fine but too chewy carmel ly
Sweet and good chocolate.However,The cocoa dusting detracts.Most of my family and friends who ate them never took seconds.I ended up giving them away to someone who will eat anything chocolate.

Excellent truffles.Two bags inside makes for good sharing or slow down in consumption.Shared with friends and everyone loved them.Very creamy.A favorite to come back for when wanting a chocolate splurge.

They have a creamy,rich but not overpowering hazelnut flavor with a crunch from the nut placed at the top of the chocolate.I like that each one is individually wrapped,making it less messy and fresher.This is one of my favorite chocolates and I find that the love notes included between the foil wrapping and the chocolate add a nice touch.

I tasted them before,they are delicious.In honor of these wonderful chocolates and following a tradition,I named my lovely Beagle after them,she is so sweet just like the chocolates. My first female doggie name was Mota.Named after another Italian brand.

Baci Perugina are the best chocolates.i was extremely happy with the product because they are super fresh.i wish they had the Bacetti available,which is the smaller version of the Baci.they make a great gift

You should try it when you are seriously in want for chocolate and want a simply fix to your desires.Dark and with the Hazelnut mixed into both the chocolate but also one in the center makes it great tasting treat.
they did t taste like bacon
No bacon flavor at all.Tastes like a sweet candy cane.
I bought these as a gag gift for my daughter,but she did not even notice that they were unusual.They are sweet and do not taste like bacon at all.Disappointed.
They were long strands and were well intact.Not a large variety of flavors and none of our three favorites.

I really like Halter bonbons.They have a genuine fruit taste and are not icky sweet like some sugar free candy.Cherry,strawberry,and orange are my favorites.I do wish they came individually wrapped.They are often hard to find and somewhat pricey,but in my view they are worth it.

i do not know whether to thank or curse the friend who introduced me to VerMints.i can eat a whole tin at one time,one mint after the other.i love the Cafe Express and the Chai,have not tried the others.Cafe Express and Chai really are not mints per se at least in my mind ,as they do not have a minty flavor,but are the size and texture of traditional mints.

Fair trade coffee and organic sweeteners make the Cafe Express my favorite VerMints flavor.They are a nice balance of candy and coffee.They are non GMO,gluten and fat free,Kosher,and vegan.And with only 5 calories and 1gm sugar per pastille,they will not destroy your diet.But beware they are addictive little treats!
These taste ever so slightly like coffee,and ever so slightly like dirt.
Discovered these last week on a trip to Vermont and now I am hooked!They are really awesome.They taste more like maple than coffee to me but whatever they are,WOW!!!! $% and and %
The coffee VerMints are so good,you will finish an entire tin before you realize it.I like the Chai and Wintermint also,but the coffee flavor is delicious.
Really good tasting ginger mints not to mention great to have on you during cold season.

When cold season comes I would not be without these little pine drop candies.The flavor is subtle and not overpowering like some of the cough drops I have tried. Halls for one They also make a pleasant little candy,not too sweet.I really like these a lot.
Very delicate flavor.Nice minty eucalyptus and pine that clear the nose and throat.I love to have those in the winter.
Great product,Great price and arrived a week earlier than expected!
Sooo good.So tasty.Shipping was great,they were good tasting not old like I was afraid they might be and I felt like a kid in a candy store when I saw the whole box.The best blowpops around.
Good product and good price
blue razberry blowpops!
It tasted different from the ones I bought from Tootsie Roll!
Got here on time.Great flavor.But,when it was time to bite and chew the gum,it was too hard to chew.Gum is stale.
Very nice packed well.Came with a cooler pack whcih was warm by the time it got here but the candy was just fine! I would definitely order these again.
Excellent product among all types of fruit slices.Comes fresh and tastes great.
Took to long to arrive.But the product is excellent!
The MOST delicious candy I have ever hadplease try it you will love it!
These were very yummy and tasted just like the fruit!Each gummy is individually wrapped which is a pretty good idea!Will buy again soon
Delicious but missing more of a lychee flavor.
I like it as a lychee candy not an herbal supplement.Each candy is individually wrapped.Each candy has a mild taste.

This is a great little after dinner gummy these guys got it right!They captured the lychee flavor without being too sugary.The fact that each gummy comes individually wrapped is also a bonus I keep these in a bowl in my kitchen and they can be enjoyed at any time!
These have a terrific lychee flavor,not too sweet,and the gummies are addictive you cannot eat just one.
These were not exactly what I was expecting but they are good non the less.They really do taste like the Lychee fruit!

I love licorice jelly beans and the Jelly Belly brand is just about the best.Their texture is the best when it comes to jelly beans.They have a pleasantly strong and genuine licorice flavor.If you do not know,Licorice flavor remains in the top 5 of Jelly Belly flavors.You either love or hate them.
my wife loved them
These were perfect!A quality jelly bean.Lots of flavor.
product is great however,word to purveyor please ship differently!The item came in a large box with plastic filler,totally unnecessary and environmentally terrible.
These are the best!Fast delivery
It is candy...come on!
Fresh hate that I got charged shipping separately from my complete order.
Nice and fresh,love them..
Love it and a great price
The pictured item is Not what was delivered.The answered questions are also inaccurate.

This is absolutely not what I ordered!!!!!!!These are Frooties.The image appears as Tootsie Rolls.I want and ordered what is in the picture.This deserves a zero rating because I did not even get what is in the picture.
The candy I received is not the candy shown in the picture.The candy I received is labeled frooties and different flavors than what these tootsie rolls fruit rolls come in.
Cook Illustrated was right again.Best tahini that I have ever used.
My husband and I have become hummus nuts since using this product.I highly recommend it!
The taste was horrible...There Is this hard grit at the bottom that does not mix with the rest of this stuff...I Am not sure what this is,because its not tahini...
Very tasty,just as expected.It is a very big tin at 15 oz.so I have plenty left for another batch of hummus!

I was unsure about about how this would taste,but I wanted to taste some japanese treats.I was really suprised at how much I would like these.They are really good and the melon flavor is fantastic.I also love the paste in the center.These make a great snack.
My favorite flavor so far!!
The taste is kind of unnatural,and strange.I recommend other flavors like chestnut.
Great taste and my daughter really loves apple sauce,a little high on the cost,but that comes with the name I guess.
Even with a cinnamon flavor,this applesauce is not too sweet.It is also much thicker than some of the other basic brands of applesasuce,so it is not so runny.Plus,it is organic!

This apple sauce is delicious,simply delicious!I like that they are in single serve containers,because a large container might go bad before you can eat it all.I also like the fact that its organic; its also not overly sweet.I would definitely recommend this to anyone.You cannot go wrong; try it,you will like this apple sauce!

I was worried that there would be added sugar in these after I ordered them,but there is not any.Just natural sweetness.The whole family loves this applesauce the grown ups,my 9 month old,and 3 year old.
Very fruity and delicious.In natural juices.
fine for off season fruit needs.I have NO patience to buy all that fruit and cut it all up...as well as where to store it before it spoils.
Big fan of power bar products overall,but the taste on these chased me away.Not good.
Our box came opened and there were only 11 12 bars in there.
I am very happy with the taste and having only 3 carbs.
I use protein bars to get enough protein in my diet without too many calories.The NuGo Smart Carb bars do that and taste great!

I got the chocolate black cherry and I personally love it!It is certainly not a NO carb bar which it is not advertised like this but it has way less carbs than regular protein bars.I usually eat half of one every night with my tea.I like the taste too.Kind of tastes like chocolate with cereal
I have tried every low carb sugar free bar there is and this is hands down the best.This bar has no artificial taste,it is just sweet enough and it satisfies both taste and hunger.
too good and have to watch it or would eat a whole box at a time!
Flat,low taste was disapointimg.
Super yummy and crunchy love them!
These are not the full bars like the pistachio pomegranate blueberry bars,which I love.These are smaller,thinner,and square and much less fruit.Disappointed.
Love me some Tings!In San Antonio one Whole Foods market carries these at times but I think it is the same size box of 12 you sell to me.
I put Tings in my snack chex mix.I live the fact that they are plain so that I can add them,otherwise they would not work in it.
These are a safe occasional snack treat for our food allergic kids.Cannot find cheese free versions in our local stores and the price is better,especially through subscribe and save.
Are they GMO free????Corn,all grains,in this country is always suspect.All natural does not mean healthy.Picture does not show the bag of the bag.
Both my husband and I really like these pita crisps.They are zesty..but not over the top spicy.We usually eat them plain,but they would be great with dips etc.
These crisps are definitely ZESTY...Yup,they are very spicy...Excellent if real spicy is what you want..I like them.Hope I have twenty words.It is a challenge to add much more to this review.
Great snack.The taste is very good been eating them for the past six months.My entire family loves them.I would recommend them if you like rice cakes,you will love these!!
I just love the Soy Crisp!Once the bag is opened it is gone in a few days!
It is almost impossible to find chips with great flavor that are not loaded with salt...these fit the bill and they are healthy.

At a reasonable price these are double the price at major grocery stores ,though it is not a large bag,I ordered these because I could not stand the copious amount of salt in a competitor brand.These chips are fairly thick,too.As long as they keep shipping them for free...I will continue to order them.

NO SALT,NO GREASE,NO GLUTEN.JUST PURE CRUNCHY CORN CHIPS,EAT THEM LIKE THEY ARE OR SCOOP UP ANYTHING TO EAT THEM WITH.CANNOT GET MUCH HEALTHIER THAN THIS,UNLESS YOU WANT TO EAT PLAIN FRESH GRASS WITH NO HERBECIDES OR PESTICIDES ON IT.DICK VOGT
Terra Exotic Vegetable Chips are the very best chips on the market.They have a good taste and are not greasy like so many similar products.
These chips are delicious.I like them better than potato chips.It is hard to eat just one!
It was tasty eating this all crumbled down and semi dampened in a soup bowl D.Just eat with some liquid,otherwise you will have tongue blisters
These taste like rich little butter cookies and the kids love them.They are beautifully shaped,which appeals to my three year old daughter,who likes to name the animals as she eats them.
These are a great snack for work,travel,or home.These are the best of gluten free.

As the mom of a 7 year old daughter who is GFCF I know how hard it is to find good cookies!These are great we both love them!They have a great texture more like a butter cookie almost and taste wonderful!No off taste from the flours,no gritty texture,and not sicky sweet just right.We tried these last summer on vacation and could not find them at home then we found them on Amazon try them you will not be sorry!
Very happy with the assortment.Everything was fresh and well packaged.
Sweetest order I have ever received and shared with my family and friends!Was worth every penny!
It is Okay,but I do not think I would buy it again,did not care for the taste of it
Kind of a rip off you can get them all separately cheaper other than that the items were good

Now I bought these because I wanted to try another brand of biscotti.At first I did not realize they were mainly for a special diet but then went ahead and ordered anyway.I still prefer Noni regular biscotti of course but I am sure I would rate these much higher if I was not able to eat regular ones.They are very good for being made special and I am sure people who need to have something like this find them excellent.
These are great and taste just like the real thing.
Never guess these are wheat free!Whole family loves them.Will continue to purchase.
Loved the tase.These are really good
Great tasting Ouma Rusks.If you were born and raised in South Africa and grew up eating this,you would love these Rusks.
Product was open and crumbled.Very disappointed
Tastes just like home.
These rusks remind me of my childhood.

These were good.They did taste a little stale,not like the ones I have had before where there was a rich taste that melts in your mouth.They seemed more dry and tasteless,stale.maybe it was the batch I got.
I personally love these cookies and I do not share!Love the packaging just the right amount for an afternoon snack.Mm mm good!
They were old.Tasted like old cooking grease made us sick to our stomach
This snack is perfect in every way.The taste is on point,with not too much PB.If you ever go to a fair,look and see if they have a Nutter Butter deep fried,it will blow your mind.

not as good as I expected from reviews,but not bad.very very crumbly expect crumbs all over.good chocolate fix,but did not taste like brownie to me.am not sure of value kind of pricey for what you get per box.
I have to hide these from my 4 yr old he absolutely Loves these cookies... he calls them his brownies great chocolat taste...
The best ready to bake cookies I have ever tried.VERY ADDICTIVE!I have bought quite a few rounds of these already and they taste amazing every time!Keep up the fantastic work!
I Did not really like the cookies.It taste like something was wrong with it.so i kind of of cannot really gave it a thumbs up.sorry
Fresh and amazing.Tin kept them fresh while I shipped them to Navy boy
I gave these cookies as a gift and they were a huge hit.The recipient raved about how fresh and large the cookies were
I sent them to my daughter,and cookies tasted like grape flavour cough syrup.I would not buy them again,and will not suggest anyone to buy these cookies
The taste is not fresh but they are OK
These cookies were stale from day 1.They should not be sold in this state.They should have been able to be returned and I should not have been charged.
sent these to clients as a holiday present and they were a huge hit.And generic enough for all faiths.
It was important to me to have cookies WITHOUT hydrogenated oil as an ingredient so I was pleased to find this product.However,the way it is packaged and or shipped,about half of them were broken.
Molded after a couple of days,some came in molded
These are a very healthy treat but given the small size of the cookie and the cost of the product,I doubt that I will buy them again.
To sweet for breakfast.
These are the best cookies ever.I love them.The taste is great you cannot eat just one.After the first bite you want to eat the whole box.I will be ordering again soon.
Fabulous cookies,even delicious with cheeses!
Anna Ginger Thins...the best Swedish cookies,without a doubt.Perfect stocking stuffers!

Every single cookie was broken into multiple pieces.Had to throw most of them out.Package was adequately boxed for normal shipping however the thin nature of these cookies just cannot handle any vibration or other shipping stress.Sorry but I will not purchase again and cannot recommend the product for shipping.

Got these to make tiramisu for my gluten intolerant wife.Tasted good in the recipe which came out great! ,I did not eat them separate from the recipe so I cannot attest to the taste by themselves but for use in tiramisu or other recipes,I would definitely get them again!

I made matcha green tea tiramisu with this.For gluten free,the texture imitates regular ladyfingers just fine,at least for use in tiramisu.The only issue I had was the extreme crumbling of the cookies from shipping.Maybe improve the packaging?

Schar gluten free lady fingers are the real deal.At Christmas I ordered 3 pkgs and made a tiramasu cheese cake which was delicious.Two weeks ago I re ordered to make Tiramasu for a dinner party.Again,the real deal.Lots of compliments on my Tiramasu
The package arrive with two thirds of cookies broken.Just tossed them.

The Jennies coconut macaroons that are individually wrapped are fresher,softer and much better than this tin of them.These were rather dried out and tiny in size.I was expecting the same item as Jennie single sold macaroon.Still,a nice treat.Will most likely stick with individual ones,however.
healthy treat,good quality,gluten and grain free,good value for the money,a dependable company,fun way to treat kids

These Coconut Macaroons are merely Okay,and not great.Certainly not anything to brag about.They lack the strong coconut flavor that I expect.And there is not any evidence of the advertised honey ingredient.I will not say that I really regret ordering these,this time.But I will not be ordering them again.
Stale and burnt.
a healthy and satisfying snack
very tasty snack.Somebody gave me one and I loved it so I bought more.

I love the almond chocolate biscuits and the almond original as well.Although this Company packages their product very well some may be broken,which is expected.It certainly does not change the taste.I am very satisfied.
Dryer than a popcorn fart.
Like having these cookies with my coffee.At least your getting some fiber and not just a carbohydrate junk bomb.

I love Kashi cookies and most all of their products though these were just a little too dry.They were very good and the chocolate flavor was very present but dry enough that it is a deal breaker.I probably would not buy these again.
Probably my most favorite cooking in the world.So sad they are this expensive and can only be obtained through Amazon.
cookies were smashed to uneatable.mostly crumbs.never again.
Not a healthy cookie but very good!Love them!

These cookies are very delicious!The whole family likes them.But the math on the price is wrong.It is $3.56 for 16 Ounce.So it should be $7.85 kg,instead of $1.96 kg.Besides,it will be helpful if the cookies in the bag were packed with small bags.It will help to keep the cookies longer.
Just like you remember them,they taste great.
Unfortunately,Tasted a little stale
I love Pizzells,but these are stale.They are not expired 12 2017 .I bought 3 different flavors and all are stale.
A little on the sweet side BUT delicious!Great with coffee or tea.Makes an almost guilt free snack.Highly recommend!!

these cookies are delicious,the creamy filling is so good and fudgie fudgey? remind me of EL Fudge cookies,I am a choco holic and I could limit myself to these alone as my only source of chocolate,yum.
YUMMY!!We order several of the Newman Own products and this is one of our clients favorites.Seems to be a bigger hit than the regular Vanilla Creme variety.
These are great cookies but I think there are like 24 cookies in each tin and I literally only had 4 in one piece.Not an effective method of shipment!
All but two cookies were broken I opened them to use at my tea party luncheon.I was really disappointed with what I found but my guests were gracious and ate them in various pieces .

The Cookies are tasty,the few that were not crushed.I was very disappointed due to most of the cookies were broken or crush.For the price that I paid,I truely expected better.My family and I had been purchasing these cookies for year.We were always delighted yo get these previously.I am not sure if I would order these again
World best shortbread
Will order from again Thank Goodness for these as I can eat these with no issues.They are red dye free an I can have them.Thanks.

These are hands down thee best chips on the market.i do not even like chips or any puffed chips but these are exception.you can only usually find them in black neighborhood coner stored.But i wish wise made a big bag version and sold them in groceries stores.they would make more money.a lot of people do not know about these chips.
It taste great.I have tried all flavors and this is the best one.

Delicious,but I only found a bag in stop and shop dedham ma,not on other stop and shops I never understand how these stores buy items because some things I buy and one chain cannot find an another chain ridiculous
I am in love with these!So buttery!
Delicious and a lot of fun to play with.My whole family enjoyed the taste,but only I got to decorate.It was too fun to stop!
These cookies were the worst......even the dog would not eat them....I thought they would be a nice gift for St Nick,,,my kids eat anything,,NOT THESE!Decoration only!WASTE OF MONEY..
This was a great easter candy for those of us that have to watch our sugar intake it was quite tasty
Although the wafers are very good,by the time they arrive at my home,only a quarter of them are whole.Most are so smashed that they are just mush at the bottom of the bag.
Love them,good price

My sister in law introduced me to these wafers and I was hooked immediately,enough that I continue to keep them on hand thanks to Amazon subscribe and save .A couple of these will satisfy your sweet tooth.The hard part is trying not to eat the whole can!Love the texture and taste.Great product.

Great snack for on the go.Kids love them and they are a little healthier than some of the other snack crackers.You pay a bit of a premium for the Annie products,but they are good and Amazon has them cheaper than my local grocery.

The product labeling in my mind is a little deceptive considering these crackers contain a forum of MESSAGE.MESSAGE most active ingredient is free glutamate.Free glutamate is the active ingredient of mono sodium glutamate,or MESSAGE.Yeast Extract contains free glutamate.In my opinion,the only reason this company is using the term Yeast Extract is to conceal the fact that this products contains MESSAGE.

I am so frustrated.I ordered two of these from Vitacost,so according to the description I should have received 12 boxes of crackers,each with 6 individual bags.Instead I received TWO boxes,which is not even one full order.I emailed this company on Saturday and have yet to hear back from them now Tuesday .
We yes,both my daughter and I love the bunnies.I am so happy Amazon sells it in the individual little bags.I can just put a snack pack in my purse and it is there whenever my daughter needs a snack.
No flavor except salt yuck
These are seriously yummy.A little too yummy,maybe.Easy to munch your way through the whole box.
My kid loves these.They are kind of like Ritz,but he loves them even more.
Much better than Ritz,these taste like Ritz used to taste.Full of flavor with a hearty texture.You will not be disappointed.
The bags were a bit smaller than I was expecting,but it is a good product I would buy again.

Very pleased.Not as greasy as some of the other brands of bagel chips I have tried.Strongly seasoned and rather small in size but the perfect foil for a small piece of habanero spiked cheddar if you like it hot or a cube or avocado if you like to mix crisp with creamy and temper the spiciness a bit. Excellent value at special offer price,but would very likely buy again at the regular bulk discount.
These things are outrageous!With A lobster dip or a Cajun crab dip,they beat anything else on the market.YUM!!!!!!
Love the flavor and crispness that last a long time.

I have replaced crackers and pretzels with this snack instead.It has helped in that I do not overeat this snack b c they are a bit on the dry side.They are a healthy alternative to get that crunch that I am always looking for.I keep one pack at the office and the other at home for snacking.
You can use this to create all kinds of combination of easy,nutritious,delicious meal snacks party food.We can only be limited by our own imagination,right?

I enjoy these either with peanut butter or tuna and cheese.The only complaint I have is that they do not come in a resealable package.Having to transfer them to another container is not the worst thing in my life,but come on!!These would become stale very quickly if not in a sealed container.Why not the one it comes in?Are you watching WASA?
These have good flavor but are so fragile that it is hard to use them for anything but crumbs and pie crusts.Smores are out of the question...probably will not be ordering them again.
Too crumbly.I can barely get them out of the package and they just crumble apart.
My family favorite graham but so hard to find in store se we use Amazon to fill our cupboard.

These are amazing,as other reviewers have said.But beware of Amazon pricing.I bought a pack of 12 boxes for $14.28 last month; now that same pack is more than $30.Check local ethnic grocers for better prices.
Crackers came in crushed.
Like the taste and it feels like I am eating something healthy.
love these crackers,tasty.low calorie
perfect for all soups.Would recommend.
I live in Canada now and these crackers are not available here.I bought a lot so I do not have to do without them.
Hardest cracker to find but the only one for Christmas Eve Oyster Stew!Now live in the Midwest and have to order online thanks so much for continuing to make and ship this product!
They are excellent with soup and are very tasty.We had eaten them at a restaurant in Perry,Georgia.Try them!
Yummy crackers.Best crackers EVER!!Not sure about the calories but I eat it for a snack almost every day.The bucket lasted me for about 2 months.
i love the taste,good combination with a bowl of chili..or just eat with cheese or peanut butter with a cup of tea.It is hard to find from stores and glad Amazon have it.

thanks to my Phillipino co worker I discovered this product a few yrs ago,out local Phillipino grocery in the city has stopped selling these for some reason so I order them on here to get my fix!They are a good cross between a saltine and a club cracker if you want to compare it to a US product that is but nothing compares to these they are great on their own with a spread and in soups!I recommend and I will continue to re purchase
the ones I got seemed 5 seconds away from STALE.I have had these before so I know what they should taste like.,
Good product and it is nice to get my golfing snacks on a regular basis.
Rancid Peanut Butter
Great snacks,great pricing,wonderful!This is a subscribe and save item that is awesome.

For me,Old London Whole Grain Melba Toast is the perfect snack when you want a little crunch,but not the overwhelming salt or sugar of chips and cookies.They are great on their own with a cup of coffee or tea,but I love to put just a touch of sugar free jelly on top for a little guilt free snacking!

I wrote this review earlier in the year but it appears to now be gone.LOVE these cookies,but the ones I got were stale.I buy them from my local grocery store and they are completely different when,well...Not stale.Bought them as Christmas gifts for my family.Huge bummer.
One of my favorite kids of cookies
Wonderful taste.
