The big problem with these crackers is that you cannot stop eating them.Great with pate or chopped chicken liver spread.

The crackers were starting to stale when I received them.The taste was off,and the crackers were really brittle.I had a pack of them myself,and then the kids ate the rest.I heard no complaints from them.
These crackers were so delicious and fresh.The kids really love them.Before I was buying them from Costco now,I would get them from Amazon.

I ordered these without really checking the brand name.They are Keebler brand.They do not taste as I expected.The crackers seem excessively salty compared to the ones I usually buy at the grocery store.I will give them to the kids of the neighbors.They will eat anything.

I used to love this popcorn but it was awful.I do not know what they have done to it but it was dry and tasted stale.It used to be really good and was hulless.Now it is just bad.I will never order it again.
Always a great taste on this popcorn!
this is pretty good popcorn if I say so my self.it pops out very good not like some microwave that leave a not of corn not popped.it is also pretty good tasting also.
This brand was recommended by our orthodontist,when my son got his braces,but it is not completely hull less.The flavor is great,though.We have enjoyed this popcorn.

Popcorn,Salt,Oil and Tocopherols Vitamin E. A little bland compared to most other popcorns but plain popcorn is bland!Popcorn all about the airy crunch,not the flavor.Never burns in my microwave and relatively few un popped kernels.
Good purchase.Have enjoyed

This is the best microwave popcorn in existence.I have tried lots of different brands and versions and this one tops them all.It has the perfect amount of salt without being overpowering.Very difficult to find in stores here,it seems to sell out as soon as it hits the shelves.I finally purchased from Amazon to get my fix.If you love popcorn but do not want all the greasy,orangey mess usually associated with the bags then get this.
best popcorn my family has had for being a natural version
This is much better than the grocery store popcorn we tried in our Wabash Valley Farms Whirley Pop popcorn popper.
Tried this on a whim and will never go back to any other popcorn.Yum is all I can say!!!

The baby white corn is sweet and tender and it does not have offensive large hulls.Tips When popping it I prefer to use a little more oil than recommended and let the pan heat up on high before adding the corn.Takes less time and the popped corn is puffier.
this was recommended by a friend who said there was almost no trash hulls,unexploded kernels,etc . he was right!also,just by the way,this popcorn is delicious
We use this popcorn with our stir crazy popper and it is amazing!I love that because it is baby kernels I do not get popcorn hulls stuck in my teeth.A delicious and enjoyable popcorn to eat.

I have been buying this brand and flavor of rice cake for a few years now,was my favorite snack,until I received these rice cakes.Something changed in the flavor,they are also very thin and crunchy where they used to be fluffy and light.I will not be buying these anymore,they were terrible.

I just bought a case of the new and improved mini munchies and they are horrible!The original munchies were just mini rice cakes and I loved them.Now they have changed and added corn and puffed the rice and I call them puff maggots because they are puffy and tasteless and gross.Do not buy these.You will hate them!If I could give them 0 stars I would.

I love these rice cakes,they are my favorite,by far,but I have not been able to find them since I moved.I like that they are small and lo cal,so they make a nice addition to any meal or the perfect snack.

We have tried just about every salted tortilla chip out their,and these chips are at the top of my list for best tasting.They are lightly salted with sea salt,and you do not have to feel guilty because they have 4gms of fiber and 4gms of complete protein in every 1oz serving!My kids love them witch is a bonus.I never thought eating something made from just beans rice,and oil could taste so good!
I am a diabetic and these let me have my chips without major carb overload.They have great flavor too.

Love this variety pack,BUT......last time I ordered the 24 variety pack but only received 6 pack of sea salt.I wrote the vendor who said they would inquire,but no response yet.That was a month ago.The chips are a great snack,crinchy,good flavor and nice change from standard chips.
This product helped to curve my chip cravings.It was very satisfying and is better for me.

Very disappointed in these Rice Krispie Treat sheets.There is no expiration date on the package.The treats are very hard.Ordered for kids to cut and decorate for Christmas,do not think that is possible.
GAVE TO MY DAUGHTERS WORK PLACE WHICH IS A RESTAURANT.THIS SOMETHING THEY DO NOT SERVE AND FEEDS A NUMBER OF PEOPLE.
Tastes good but minus 2 stars because it was ridiculous that I could not find an expiration or use by date on it.Either there was no date at all or it was far too hard to find.Very frustrating.
Rice crispy treats the size of a cake,no complaints here.
We love this stuff!Served as a dip for coconut shrimp,there is nothing better!Yum!Sweet and spicy.But not too spicy.
These are extremely handy for lunches,Jellos and frozen juice bars.Good product,good dice size.
These have large pieces of fruit in even amounts of peaches,pears and pineapples.I love these.I bought 2 cases.They arrived safely.I will order again!
I have had it and given as a gift,it is a tasty treat you can take on the go
hard,chocolate does not taste like chocolate

The case I received was not supposed to be expired but the bars seemed old,the chocolate chips were whitish old looking and the taste was off.I Have been buying these from the supermarket for years and they are normally delicious.I was disappointed with these.
I love Kashi but these tasted terrible.

The bars were not in a box but put in an unmarked envelope....kind of weird.Also the apple pear was actually apple pear and ginger flavor never heard of that one .I have not eaten one yet,but each individual item looks new

I have ordered these bars many times and love them.I decided to do a variety pack for a change with this order.The bars were fine,but the pear apple had ginger,and I was under the impression from the add that it was plain.Not a fan of this flavor,otherwise very pleased.
Not a fan.Tart.But like the ingredients.
Great quality.Tastes great too!
I love the fact that they are vegan!
My kids all love these bars.I was thrilled that I could get them in bulk and a lower price than the local natural stores.

I buy these all the time,usually from target or a grocery store.And I LOVE them.Makes a great snack or on the go breakfast.Delicious with my morning coffee.Almost always have on in my purse for emergencies,I try to eat only organic or whole foods like larabars .
Taste good but dry and crumbly

These are truly the BEST protein bars EVER!!!My doctor office sales them and after trying,I just had to order some of my own!Was a little troubled that I could not get a better deal only 6 cents each cheaper but nonetheless the product is SCRUMPTIOUS!!!
Lower sugar and gases fine.And I usually do not eat low sugar or diet foods.

I could not taste Asiago or any cheese feel flavor,not even sesame as they claim with a BOLD line on the first ingredients in capital and bold line OUR TASTY INGREDIENTS KASHI SEVEN WHOLE GRAINS and SESAME... I will say NOT TASTY AT ALL!!!I Thanks to apple sauce I will be able to consume this until its gone,I hate throwing food away even if it taste horrible!
A very good cracker.Crunchy,while not being hard on the teeth.I drive for a living,and have a thing for eating while I drive,so I may as well eat something healthy.
Got it as a surprise for my husband since we do not have these chips in Colorado and he is from Baltimore he said they do not taste at all the same they are bland definitely a fail
Love the chips but seriously....you are going to send me an $8 bag of chips that are past the guaranteed fresh date.Shame on you!
These chips we very very salty!And they had a January expiration date.These were ordered as a Christmas gift.
CHIPS WERE CRACKED UP AND VERY OVER PRICED SHOULD BE REPLACED;
Great!Love them.
These are seriously the best chips on the planet!

This is a really great dip.The balance between the sweetness of the pineapple and the hot spiciness of the hababero is perfect.This works well by itself as a dip for crackers or pretzels.However,what is even better is mixing this dip with a combination of cream cheese and softened cheddar cheese.The result is an excellent dip that is sure to be a party favorite.It is one of my favorite cheese dips of all time.This dip is all natural and gluten free.
Put this over some cream cheese the best appetizer ever!It is so good,you do not even need a party!
The only drawback to this product is the price,but you cannot beat the taste!Pour over cream cheese,grab some crackers and off you go!
way over priced.caught me once but again
This stuff tastes like a cross between cheap pasta sauce and ketchup DO NO BUY THIS
With a name like this I expected it to have some spice and good taste.I got neither.I will definitely go back to Ortega.
Who does not love Newma Own Salsa.Just the right amount of heat and flavor.It is a must have in my fridge.
Just right and fast delivery!
Stale when delivered
Fast delivery.Fresh product in well packed boxes.If you love these kakes but cannot find them locally,this will do the trick.
Yummy!!!came fresh in the box
They were really expensive and I paid 32 and when I got them they were only 1.99 per box I only got six boxes and they were not really fresh
I cannot find them in any store.I think this is way too much money but I am just happy to have them.Though I find myself looking at them like gold and I will not eat them.Lol
tastetake blueberry pies,crust is light and tasty,filling taste like blueberry were just picked,and not too sweet.

I used to live out east and I love these.I live in Colorado and Tastykakes are hard to come by here.So getting a box filled with 6 delicious blueberry pies that were fresh and yummy was like a gift from the gods of back east treats.Price was a little high for just 6 pies,but it was worth it to get my fix.
